column1: The ship wasn't designed to operate for centuries. Air filtration systems are breaking down and need repair otherwise people will suffer from poor air quality
column7: The poor air quality starves the crew of oxygen in their sleep. -1 intelligence to all.
column8: The air filters are fixed -- for now anyway

column1: The crew split into two rival factions which war for resources.
column7: The rivalry boils over into a fight and a crew member is killed!
column8: The rival factions make peace and learn a lesson about understanding. +1 Empathy
